title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 513 - Prior Approval Of Medical, Dental And Remedial Care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 513 - Prior Approval Of Medical, Dental And Remedial Care

State Regulations
§ 513.0 - Policy, purpose and scope
§ 513.1 - Definitions
§ 513.2 - Procedure for obtaining prior approval
§ 513.3 - Obligations end responsibilities of recipients
§ 513.4 - Obligations and responsibilities of the ordering practitioner and potential provider
§ 513.5 - Obligations and responsibilities of the Department of Health
§ 513.6 - Evaluation of requests
§ 513.7 - Determinations
§ 513.8 - Fair hearings

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 513

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 206; Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 363-a[2], 365-a[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
